info.name: RoundCube Bridge
info.description:
Provides a communication bridge between RoundCube (embedded via mail_roundcube app) and Nextcloud services.
**Features:** - Attach files from Nextcloud to emails - Save email attachments to Nextcloud - Insert public share links into emails - Add calendar invitations (.ics) to Nextcloud Calendar
**Requirements:** - mail_roundcube app must be installed - NextBridge plugin must be installed in RoundCube
See [NextBridge](https://github.com/Gecka-Apps/NextBridge) for the RoundCube plugin.
info.author: Laurent Dinclaux
